newsitem.title: USA: El Salvador buys U.S. PL-480 tallow and vegoil.
newsitem.headline: El Salvador buys U.S. PL-480 tallow and vegoil.

text.p: El Salvador bought on Tuesday a total of 2,908.5 tonnes prime bleachable summer yellow cottonseed oil in bulk and 1,500 tonnes of sunflowerseed oil under the PL-480 export program, its U.S. export agent said.
Out of 2,908.5 tonnes of PBSY cottonseed oil, 1,050 tonnes was bought at $600.38 per tonne, 1,050 tonnes at $605.90, 283.5 tonnes at $609.86 and 525 tonnes at $615.75, FOB, Houston.
The crude sunflowerseed oil was bought at $547.88 a tonne, FOB Houston, five percent less at buyers' option.
El Salvador also purchased a total of 2,374 tonnes of tallow, five percent less at buyers' option, its U.S. export agent said.
Out of that total, 1,650 tonnes of tallow was bought at $505.00 a tonne and 724 tonnes at $506.00, FOB, Houston.
Shipment dates for all commodities were set for July 20-August 5.
